mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (member_id, order_number, status, total_amount, receiver_name, receiver_phone, zipcode, addr, addr_detail, message) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{orderNumber}, #{status}, #{totalAmount}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
